name: Re_Set
slogan: Boutique Strategy Consultancy Specialising in Disruption
description:
RE_SET is a boutique strategy consultancy specialising in disruption. We work at Board level to assess and activate value created through business disruption and innovation. Project work varies greatly, from short PE due diligences (e.g. evaluating new players looking to transform their market), to long-term innovation transformation programmes (e.g. large corporates needing to re-invent their business through an agile and innovative cultural change project). Our clients so far span multiple industries, including travel & tourism, property, retail, financial services and the public sector. 

A key pillar of our business mission, and one of our differentials, is the fact that sustainability underpins our business: we are a 1% for the Planet business and a pending B Corp. We’re about driving positive change and creating real value – for the world, our clients and for us. If a project is not striving to bring about this positive change, we won’t do it.

jobs.title: Consultant
jobs.description:
What You’ll Be Doing 

Owning work streams and supporting small projects, with a balance of guidance and autonomy
Planning, structuring and delivering project research, analysis and recommendations in the form of written deliverables, client meetings and workshops
Assisting in the running of client meetings and facilitating project workshops between small stakeholder groups
Continuously learning and keeping up to date on relevant market trends, industry news, and technical tools that are relevant to RE_SET sectors and our work more generally
Participating in the company’s PR activities, including writing articles and designing and uploading content to the company’s website and selected social networks
Contributing to developing the company’s set of tools and methodologies
Contributing to, and producing, RE_SET proposals and pitch materials
Pro-actively playing a role in internal RE_SET initiatives, such as marketing and recruiting
 

What We Look For

Previous excellent delivery in a consulting role, with a strong track record of achieving great results
A smart, energetic and creative thinker who can generate big-picture inspirational ideas and solutions, all whilst maintaining structure and a focus on the details
Demonstrable analytical and quantitative skills, including financial modelling
Ability to work both independently and as part of a team
Ability to manage own time and workload, including being able to adapt to changing priorities and deadlines in a fast-paced environment
A passion for innovation as a topic, either through previous professional experience, volunteering activity, entrepreneurial venture or past student project
A true entrepreneurial spirit and hunger to contribute to the building of RE_SET


Requirements 

Must Have:

Minimum 2-3 years work experience in consulting 
Top quartile academic record in any discipline
Perfect command of English, both written and oral
Expert in MS Excel and PowerPoint. Ability to structure and develop quantitative excel models and analysis, to generate data-driven results and recommendations. Ability to structure, create and present top quality presentations.
Digitally savvy and able to fluently converse in key business concepts
Comfortable interacting one-on-one with clients and building new professional relationships quickly

Desired

Demonstrable entrepreneurial experience, having either setup, or participated, in early stage startups or run their own business or society
Knowledge of the startup scene and is up to date with the latest trends, technology and software development 
Experience in advanced analytics and visualisation tools (Tableau, Alteryx, PowerBI, etc.)
 

Further Details

Location: 80% based at our office in Somerset House. Occasional travel to client site around London and the UK, dependent on project. 
Perks: 
             Start-up office culture
             The best work-life balance you will see in consulting
             Weekly team lunch
             Regular office drinks
             Option to work from home on Fridays
             Exciting and meaningful projects
Equity in the business

Salary

£35,000 - £50,000   Total on target compensation (depending on experience) 

Re_Set is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

jobs.title: Director
jobs.description:
What You’ll Be Doing 

Leading multiple projects simultaneously with autonomy
Planning, structuring and managing projects end to end, including at all stages from pitch, delivery, recommendation and follow-up
Structuring, managing and coaching small project teams of 2-4 consultants
Ensuring written deliverables, client meetings and workshops are best-in-class 
Owning client relationships and ensuring excellent stakeholder management
Playing an active role in business development, from delivering pitches to pro-actively seeking new opportunities
Participating in the company’s PR activities, including speaking at events, contributing to thought leadership pieces and general social and online presence
Leveraging your expertise to develop the company’s set of tools and methodologies
Pro-actively playing a role in internal RE_SET initiatives, such as leading marketing or recruiting initiatives 
 

What We Look For

Previous project management in a professional service (ideally consulting) role, with a strong track record of achieving outstanding results
Ability to get stuck in – a keenness to contribute to the delivery of projects is a must: demonstrable analytical and quantitative skills, including financial modelling
Evidence of contribution to business development activities
Experience of managing people and coaching consultants along the way
Ability to manage time and workload of a team, and oneself, including being able to adapt to changing priorities and deadlines in a fast-paced environment
A smart, energetic and creative thinker who can generate big-picture inspirational ideas and solutions, all whilst maintaining structure and a focus on the details
A passion for innovation as a topic, either through previous professional experience, volunteering activity, entrepreneurial venture or past student project
A true entrepreneurial spirit and hunger to contribute to the building of RE_SET
 

Requirements 

Must Have:
Minimum 6-10 years of professional work experience with at least three years in consulting.
At least 2 years of managing people / teams
Experience in an entrepreneurial or innovation role
Top quartile academic record in any discipline
Perfect command of English, both written and oral
Expert in MS Excel and PowerPoint. Demonstrable ability to structure and develop quantitative excel models and analysis, to generate data-driven results and recommendations. Ability to structure, create and deliver top quality presentations.
Digitally savvy and able to fluently converse in key business concepts
Comfortable interacting one-on-one with senior clients and building new professional relationships quickly
Desired:
Existing relationships with senior clients
Expertise across Strategy, Innovation, Digital Transformation or Cultural Change
Entrepreneurial experience, having either setup, or participated, in early stage startups or run their own business or society
Knowledge of the startup scene and is up to date with the latest trends, technology and software development 
Experience in advanced analytics and visualisation tools (Tableau, Alteryx, PowerBI, etc.)
 

Further Details

Location: 80% based at our office in Somerset House. Occasional travel to client site around London and the UK, dependent on project. 
Perks
            Start-up office culture
            Best work-life balance you'll find in consulting
            Weekly team lunch
            Regular office drinks
            Option to work from home on Fridays
            Exciting and meaningful projects

Remuneration: Total on target compensation £90k - £140k (depending on experience) + Equity in the business

Please apply using the following link: 

https://hire.withgoogle.com/public/jobs/thisisresetcom/view/P_AAAAABkAADTA8T99V9nZsj

We are unable to sponsor visa's at this time.
